snippet: For many in the audience of the Hollywood Bowl, the arrival of four high-definition video screens has been a gift. But not all are thrilled by the technology.
abstract: Installation of four high-definition video screens at Hollywood Bowl amphitheater in Los Angeles is greeted with mixed reviews; audience members who sit at top of amphitheater say screens allow them to see tiny specks on stage during concerts, but others find them blindingly bright.
lead_paragraph: For many in the audience of the Hollywood Bowl, the arrival of four high-definition video screens has been a gift. But not all are thrilled by the technology.

headline.main: Big Screens That Not All of Hollywood Adores
headline.print_headline: Big Screens That Not All Of Hollywood Adores
